actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to exempt residential care facilities which employ certain patients from the minimum wages and maximum hours provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.

summary.text: Exempts residential care facilities from the minimum wages and maximum hours provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act with respect to the employment of patients.

titles.title: A bill to exempt residential care facilities which employ certain patients from the minimum wages and maximum hours provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
